subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Andreas Prommegger of Austria and Nicolien Sauerbreij of the Netherlands won parallel giant slalom races in the snowboard World Cup in La Molina, Spain.Prommegger outpaced Anton Unterkofler of Austria to win the third of eight men’s parallel giant slalom races this season. Sauerbreij, the women’s overall World Cup leader, beat Claudia Riegler of Austria in the final.
